CadBerry/MouseCode.h
####################
Defines CadBerry's mouse codes

Defines
=======
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_1: 0
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_2: 1
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_3: 2
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_4: 3
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_5: 4
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_6: 5
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_7: 6
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_8: 7
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_LAST: CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_8
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_LEFT: CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_1
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_RIGHT: CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_2
CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_MIDDLE: CDB_MOUSE_BUTTON_3
